attributes.action: Change the legal system imposing the mandatory deportation of foreign criminals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why waste more and more public money on later appeals against removal when the judgement to deport should be handed down at the time of sentencing with no right to challenge. After all, foreign nationals shouldn't have recourse to public funds on any account.  THIS PETITION BEARS LITTLE RELEVANCE TO THE LINK ASSERTED AND IS THEREFORE NOT SIMILAR OR OVERLAPS.
